about_the_game:
✨ Dive into "Reborn" - Your VR Social Media Platform ✨

🎥 Your VR Social Media - Capture your life in VR and discover more.
🙌 Instant Messaging & Group Features - Find close friendships and connect daily in 3D.
💖 Perfect Matching - Find your ideal partner or date.
🎮 Unlimited Modding Abilities - Build and explore vast multiplayer open worlds in VR.

Quest: https://meta.com/experiences/9100500193300999/
SideQuest: https://sidequestvr.com/app/12382/reborn
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2089520/Reborn_VR/

🎨 Be YOU, Be REBORN! 🎨
Tired of the same old avatars? Customize your own and stand out! Show off your unique style and vibe in a world where creativity knows no bounds.

🌍 Craft, Share, and Connect! 🌍
From building epic game worlds with your squad to jamming out at live vtuber concerts with hundreds of fans – the possibilities are ENDLESS. Dive into immersive stories, create virtual masterpieces, or even produce your own VR game. The spotlight's on YOU!

🎤 Join the Global Stage! 🎤
Are you a budding virtual musician? A world crafter? Or just have a killer idea? Reborn is your stage. Grow your fanbase, monetize your creations, and let the world see your genius.

🌟 Real Judgments? Nah, We're All Stars Here! 🌟
In Reborn, you're not defined by real-world judgments. Shine bright with your talents and creativity. After all, it's not about who you are IRL, but the magic you bring to the VR world.

So, what are you waiting for? Dive in, and let's get reborn together! 😉🎮🌌

#RebornVR #UnleashYourReality #BeReborn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10、Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
